Name: Android
About the game: Android is a 2D platformer very similar to Brøderbund’s classic Lode Runner. The goal is to guide an android around each level, collecting every bag of gold on the screen while avoiding roving enemies and collecting bonus fruit. As with Lode Runner, gameplay involves running, climbing, hanging, and dropping bombs in order to dig holes or trap enemies. Online Scorings Gamepad Support Enjoy 5 worlds of 20 levels, 100 levels for hours of fun : - Jungle - Construction - Antartica - Vegas - Circus
